mainText:
To the Family of Steve:
No one can say we understand, unless we personally knew or loved him, but I
can say I do know what it is to lose those I love. Trust me, with time the
pain will give way to happy memories. God bless you all.

Thank you Steve:
For all that you have done to make life easier, more profitable and more
FUN! Let us put it this way "I am a MAC."

Thank you Apple employees:
Thank you for your part in making a splendid product. Good job.
author: Dawn
